verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician [לִידִיתוּן כ] (לִֽידוּת֗וּן <S%H3038><s%> Jeduthun ק) מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David אָמַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said אֶֽשְׁמְרָ֣ה <S%H8104><s%> I will take heed דְרָכַי֮ <S%H1870><s%> to my ways מֵחֲט֪וֹא <S%H2398><s%> that I sin בִלְשׁ֫וֹנִ֥י <S%H3956><s%> not with my tongue אֶשְׁמְרָ֥ה <S%H8104><s%> I will keep לְפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> my mouth מַחְס֑וֹם <S%H4269><s%> with a bridle בְּעֹ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against רָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> while the wicked לְנֶגְדִּֽי׃ <S%H5048><s%> my presence

נֶאֱלַ֣מְתִּי <S%H481><s%> I was dumb ד֭וּמִיָּה <S%H1747><s%> with silence הֶחֱשֵׁ֣יתִי <S%H2814><s%> I held my peace מִטּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [even] from good וּכְאֵבִ֥י <S%H3511><s%> and my sorrow נֶעְכָּֽר׃ <S%H5916><s%> was stirred

חַם־ <S%H2552><s%> was hot לִבִּ֨י ׀ <S%H3820><s%> My heart בְּקִרְבִּ֗י <S%H7130><s%> within בַּהֲגִיגִ֥י <S%H1901><s%> me while I was musing תִבְעַר־ <S%H1197><s%> burned אֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire דִּ֝בַּ֗רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> spake בִּלְשֽׁוֹנִי׃ <S%H3956><s%> I with my tongue

הוֹדִ֘יעֵ֤נִי <S%H3045><s%> make me to know יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> LORD קִצִּ֗י <S%H7093><s%> mine end וּמִדַּ֣ת <S%H4060><s%> and the measure יָמַ֣י <S%H3117><s%> of my days מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> me אֵ֝דְעָ֗ה <S%H3045><s%> what it [is that] I may know מֶה־ <S%H4100><s%> how חָדֵ֥ל <S%H2310><s%> how frail אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold טְפָח֨וֹת ׀ <S%H2947><s%> [as] an handbreadth נָ֘תַ֤תָּה <S%H5414><s%> Behold thou hast made יָמַ֗י <S%H3117><s%> my days וְחֶלְדִּ֣י <S%H2465><s%> and mine age כְאַ֣יִן <S%H369><s%> nothing נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5048><s%> your sight אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> [is] as nothing before thee verily every הֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> vanity כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> [is] altogether אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> man נִצָּ֥ב <S%H5324><s%> at his best state סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely בְּצֶ֤לֶם ׀ <S%H6754><s%> in a vain shew יִֽתְהַלֶּךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> walketh אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Surely every man אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely הֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> in vain יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <S%H1993><s%> surely they are disquieted יִ֝צְבֹּ֗ר <S%H6651><s%> he heapeth up וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and does not יֵדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> [riches] and knoweth מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> who אֹסְפָֽם׃ <S%H622><s%> not who shall gather

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> and now מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what קִּוִּ֣יתִי <S%H6960><s%> what wait אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> And now Lord תּ֝וֹחַלְתִּ֗י <S%H8431><s%> I for? my hope לְךָ֣ הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פְּשָׁעַ֥י <S%H6588><s%> me from all my transgressions הַצִּילֵ֑נִי <S%H5337><s%> Deliver חֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> me not the reproach נָ֝בָ֗ל <S%H5036><s%> of the foolish אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּשִׂימֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7760><s%> make

נֶ֭אֱלַמְתִּי <S%H481><s%> I was dumb לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶפְתַּח־ <S%H6605><s%> I opened פִּ֑י <S%H6310><s%> not my mouth כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> Because אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> who עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ <S%H6213><s%> because thou didst

הָסֵ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> away מֵעָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> and נִגְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H5061><s%> thy stroke מִתִּגְרַ֥ת <S%H8409><s%> by the blow יָ֝דְךָ֗ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hand אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am כָלִֽיתִי׃ <S%H3615><s%> from me I am consumed

בְּֽתוֹכָ֘ח֤וֹת <S%H8433><s%> When thou with rebukes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for עָוֹ֨ן ׀ <S%H5771><s%> for iniquity יִסַּ֬רְתָּ <S%H3256><s%> dost correct אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man וַתֶּ֣מֶס <S%H4529><s%> to consume away כָּעָ֣שׁ <S%H6211><s%> like a moth חֲמוּד֑וֹ <S%H2530><s%> thou makest his beauty אַ֤ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely הֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> [is] vanity כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> surely every man סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

שִֽׁמְעָ֥ה־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear תְפִלָּתִ֨י ׀ <S%H8605><s%> my prayer יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD וְשַׁוְעָתִ֨י ׀ <S%H7775><s%> unto my cry הַאֲזִינָה֮ <S%H238><s%> and give ear אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> at דִּמְעָתִ֗י <S%H1832><s%> at my tears אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּ֫חֱרַ֥שׁ <S%H2790><s%> hold not thy peace כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> I am a גֵ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> for I [am] a stranger אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> You תּ֝וֹשָׁ֗ב <S%H8453><s%> with thee [and] a sojourner כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲבוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> as all my fathers

הָשַׁ֣ע <S%H8159><s%> O spare מִמֶּ֣נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at וְאַבְלִ֑יגָה <S%H1082><s%> me that I may recover strength בְּטֶ֖רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before אֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> depart וְאֵינֶֽנִּי׃ <S%H369><s%> no
